COMMENTS.GENERAL: Measurements are in SI units, angles in radians. Sources: WPA rules: wpapool.com/equipment-specifications, BCA rules: bca-pool.com/associations/7744/files/BCAEquipmentSpecifications_2008.pdf
COMMENTS.BALL_RADIUS: Billiard ball radius, WPA requires 0.5*2.25 inches
COMMENTS.CUSHION_WIDTH: Width of cloth-covered cushion (as seen from above), WPA requires [1.875,2].
COMMENTS.CUSHION_NOSE_HEIGHT: Height of nose of cushion (approx 1.43"), WPA requires [62.5%,64.5%], BCA requires [63.2,65.277]
COMMENTS.CUSHION_RUBBER_BASE_LENGTH: K66 rubber base length (base against cushion)
COMMENTS.CUSHION_RUBBER_SIDE_LENGTH: K66 rubber side length (top and bottom)
COMMENTS.CUSHION_K66_PROFILE_ANGLE: Angle between the base of the k66 cushion rubber and a vertical line (16deg to 27deg).
COMMENTS.CUSHION_NOSE_ANGLE: Angle at nose of cushion to basepoints of rubber cushion
COMMENTS.CUSHION_BED_ANGLE: Angle between cushion and table bed
COMMENTS.CUSHION_SLOPE: Small angle between cushion and horizon.
COMMENTS.CORNER_POCKET_MOUTH: Length of corner-pocket mouth (distance from nose to nose), WPA requires [4.5,4.625], BCA requires [4.875,5.125]
COMMENTS.CORNER_POCKET_HORIZONTAL_ANGLE: Horizontal pocket cut angle for corner-pocket, WPA requires 142, BCA requires 142
COMMENTS.CORNER_POCKET_SHELF: Shelf depth for corner-pocket, WPA requires [1,2.25], BCA requires [1.625,1.875]
COMMENTS.CORNER_POCKET_RADIUS: Radius of the corner pocket circle, maybe 3"
COMMENTS.CORNER_POCKET_VERTICAL_ANGLE: Vertical pocket cut angle, WPA requires [12,15], BCA requires 12
COMMENTS.SIDE_POCKET_MOUTH: Length of side-pocket mouth (distance from nose to nose) (usually corner pocket mouth +0.5), WPA requires [5,5.125], BCA requires [5.375,5.625]
COMMENTS.SIDE_POCKET_HORIZONTAL_ANGLE: Horizontal pocket cut angle for side-pocket, WPA requires 104, BCA requires 103
COMMENTS.SIDE_POCKET_SHELF: Shelf depth for side-pocket, WPA, BCA require [0,0.375]
COMMENTS.SIDE_POCKET_RADIUS: Radius of the side pocket circle, maybe 3"
COMMENTS.SIDE_POCKET_VERTICAL_ANGLE: Vertical pocket cut angle, WPA,BCA require [12,15]
COMMENTS.TABLE_LENGTH: Distance from nose to nose, WPA requires 100 for 9-foot table. Width is always half of length.
COMMENTS.TABLE_HEIGHT: Table bed height from floor, WPA requires [29.25,31], BCA requires 30
COMMENTS.TABLE_RAIL_WIDTH: Width of rail including cloth, WPA requires [4,7.5]
COMMENTS.TABLE_DROP_POINT_SLATE_RADIUS: "The pocket radius measured from the vertical cut of the slate to the playing surface.", BCA requires [0.125,0.25]
COMMENTS.TABLE_SLATE_THICKNESS: Height of the slate WPA requires >=1
COMMENTS.TABLE_RAIL_HEIGHT: Height of rail from table bed (1.6" for 23deg CUSHION_K66_PROFILE_ANGLE)
